summary: Tested 5 specific UI fixes for pet grooming app. 4 of 5 fixes verified working. Search icon overlap issue persists due to CSS specificity conflict.

ui_bugs.issue: Search icon still overlaps text input. pl-11 class is overridden by input-maya CSS class which sets padding: 0.75rem 1rem
ui_bugs.fix_suggestion: Change input-maya class to not set padding-left, or use !important on pl-11, or use inline style

passed_tests: Dialog X close button - h-5 w-5 with p-1.5 padding and hover state (VERIFIED)
Invoice view modal - X button and Print button NOT overlapping (VERIFIED - Print button moved below title)
Today button - scrolls calendar to current time with smooth behavior (VERIFIED)
Invoice number generation - unique sequential numbers INV-YYYYMM-XXXX (VERIFIED - tested 3 invoices)
GST calculation on invoices when enabled in settings (code review verified)
failed_tests: Customers page search icon - still overlaps text input due to CSS specificity issue
action_items: Fix search input padding on Customers page - the pl-11 Tailwind class is being overridden by .input-maya CSS class. Options: 1) Remove padding from input-maya, 2) Use style={{paddingLeft: '2.75rem'}} inline, 3) Add !important to pl-11
critical_code_review_comments: CSS specificity conflict: .input-maya sets padding: 0.75rem 1rem which overrides Tailwind's pl-11 class
Invoice number generation correctly finds highest existing number and increments (line 1230-1253 in server.py)
Dialog X button properly styled with h-5 w-5, p-1.5, and hover:bg-gray-100 (line 37-41 in dialog.jsx)
goToToday function uses setTimeout with scrollTo smooth behavior (line 168-184 in Calendar.jsx)
seed_data_creation: Created 3 test invoices (INV-202601-0001, INV-202601-0002, INV-202601-0003) for testing unique numbering
context_for_next_testing_agent: 4 of 5 fixes verified working. Only remaining issue is search icon overlap on Customers page due to CSS specificity - input-maya class overrides pl-11. Test user: frontendtest@test.com/test123. Test client 'Test Client' exists with invoices.
